Detailed Description

ParSpike: parallel environment variables.

This class encapsulates the parallel environment variables taken from nrnmpi folder in NEURON

Member Function Documentation

void ParSpike::make_spike_type (  ) 

Create the MPI block of spike packets to be sent/received

int ParSpike::spike_exchange (  )  [static]

Method to Send/Recv all spikes using MPI_Allgather, taken directly from NEURON.

Reimplemented in NetPar.

int ParSpike::spike_exchange_compressed (  )  [static]

spike_exchange_compressed: comments from original work

The compressed spike format is restricted to the fixed step method and is a sequence of unsigned char. nspike = buf[0]*256 + buf[1] a sequence of spiketime, localgid pairs. There are nspike of them. spiketime is relative to the last transfer time in units of dt. note that this requires a mindelay < 256*dt. localgid is an unsigned int, unsigned short, or unsigned char in size depending on the range and thus takes own byte coding. When the localgid range is smaller than the true gid range, the gid->PreSyn are remapped into hostid specific maps. If there are not many holes, i.e just about every spike from a source machine is delivered to some cell on a target machine, then instead of a hash map, a vector is used. The allgather sends the first part of the buf and the allgatherv buffer sends any overflow.

Reimplemented in NetPar.

void ParSpike::barrier (  ) 

Barrier interface to MPI_Barrier.

Halts processors until they all reach this point
